description: Peter is your typical 21 year old Latin guy: dark, handsome, macho and with a lusty appetite simmering just under the surface.  When I first met him, he seems kind of reserved but I know by now, it's always the quiet ones that really suprise me.Peter was no exception: his shyness wore off as soon as the camera was turned on. He reveals in his biography he has an exhibitionist streak and just talking about it clearly got his juices flowing. Many first time models need a little visual stimualtion when it comes time to producing an erection. But no porn required for this guy, before he even dropped his pants, his Taco Stand was ready for business and then some.Soon as I saw that thick mound in his boxers, I was dying to see what was underneath. I surely wasn't dissapointed with what was inside but liked seeing his empty those low hanging balls even better!
title: Fresh Salsa, Scene #01
